home.heroSubtitle: Discover extraordinary destinations, create personalized itineraries, and live unforgettable experiences. Let us guide you to your dream journey.
home.planTripDesc: Create custom itineraries with our smart AI that adapts to your tastes, budget, and adventure dreams.
home.exploreWorldDesc: Discover magical places, authentic experiences, and well-kept secrets shared by our community of travelers.
home.shareStoriesDesc: Immortalize your adventures and inspire other traveling souls with your discoveries and precious moments.

planTrip.title: Plan your perfect getaway
planTrip.subtitle: Create a custom itinerary with our AI assistant that understands your adventure desires
planTrip.smartRecommendationsDesc: Our AI analyzes your preferences to suggest unique experiences

beInspired.title: Get inspired
beInspired.subtitle: Discover extraordinary places and authentic experiences that will awaken your adventurous soul

travelStories.title: Travel Stories
travelStories.subtitle: Discover captivating tales from adventurers and share your own experiences to inspire the community

partnerApplication.title: Become a Partner
partnerApplication.subtitle: Join our partner network and showcase your exceptional places to a passionate community of travelers from around the world.

visibility.title: Premium Visibility
visibility.description: Showcase your places with a distinctive partner badge and priority positioning on our platform.

priority.title: Featured Placement
priority.description: Benefit from priority positioning on the map and in personalized recommendations.

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.description: Access detailed performance statistics and insights about your visitors.

step3.title: Validation & Activation

form.photosHelp: Add photos to showcase your point of interest
